1280320.name: Eighteen Gold
1280320.description:
Enlist in law enforcement or misfortune, take the intensity of combat to a new level and control of the situation in your hands, with the magnificent shooting simulator with 85% realism "Eighteen Gold". Choose your weapon, prove your worth on the field, rise and compete to enter elite forces where only the best survive.

Eighteen Gold is an action shooter game based on multiplayer mode.

Eighteen Gold 2

Get ready to feel the harsh truth, the most realistic authentic shooting simulator in the world with 99.9% realism (Note: it is only an approximation of reality, real life cannot be simulated in a video game), over 4 years of research, more than 200 shootings, over 40 tests to create the most realistic shooting simulator in the world, integrated exclusively in Eighteen and Eighteen Gold 2.

Eighteen Gold 2 now features military battles for the ultimate multiplayer shooter experience.

Includes: (Eighteen Gold Special Edition)

Base Content and 3 DLC Content

Variety of Modes and some Zombies Mode.

Good arsenal

Variety of characters

Custom weapons

New Enhancements

Future content

2 Apps:

Eighteen Gold Special Edition

Eighteen Gold 2
1280320.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
